function.name: water_setAmountLevel
function.description: This function is used to adjust the water usage level of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to adjust the water usage level.

predefinedWaterAmountLevel.description: The predefined water usage level to be set.
